segments.text: The image of the woman drying dishes while the chaos unfolds is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a burst of amusement at the contrast of her calmness against the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost as if she’s in her own little world, oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what she would think if she suddenly realized the sink was overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling everywhere, and yet she doesn’t seem to notice a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a disaster waiting to happen, yet she’s so absorbed in this mundane task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little pit in my stomach as I watch the scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
